subject: Personal Finance
title: The Gig Economy
description: A quick, practical guide to The Gig Economy.

hook.text: 36% of US workers now freelance. The traditional 9-to-5 with benefits is no longer the default.

buildup.text: The gig economy connects workers to short-term tasks through platforms like Uber, Fiverr, and DoorDash.

discovery.text: Gig work offers flexibility and autonomy. Many workers value controlling their own schedule.

twist.text: But gig workers get no health insurance, retirement plans, or job security. Freedom has a hidden cost.

climax.text: The debate rages: are gig workers empowered entrepreneurs or exploited laborers? The answer depends on who you ask.

quiz.question: What is a key downside of gig work?
options: No benefits like health insurance or retirement plans
